name: attractively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very pleasing in appearance or sound: She always dresses very attractively. Their house is attractively decorated.
in a way that causes interest or makes people want to do something: The area offers plenty of attractively priced accommodation. We always need to price our products attractively. See
attractive
